name: Dr. Sarah Williams
bio: Dr. Sarah Williams founded Bright Futures Learning Center after 15 years as an elementary school principal. Witnessing the reading gap in underserved communities, she left her position to create a nonprofit focused solely on literacy intervention. Sarah holds a doctorate in Education from Columbia University and is passionate about making reading accessible to every child. Under her leadership, Bright Futures has helped over 2,000 children improve their reading skills.
